about.title: About Tlemcen Smart Supermarket
about.subtitle: Bringing convenience and quality to our community.
about.p1: Welcome to Tlemcen Smart Supermarket, your premier destination for quality groceries and fresh produce in the heart of Tlemcen. Our mission is to simplify your shopping experience while offering an unparalleled selection of local and imported goods.
about.p2: Founded on the principles of quality, convenience, and community, we combine the warmth of a local market with the efficiency of modern technology. Our online system ensures you can shop from the comfort of your home and have your groceries delivered right to your doorstep.
about.p3: We take pride in supporting local farmers and producers, ensuring you get the freshest products available while supporting our local economy. Thank you for choosing Tlemcen Smart Supermarket. We look forward to serving you!

legal.p1_text: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, place an order, or contact customer support.
legal.p2_text: We use the information we collect to:
legal.p2_l1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services.
legal.p2_l2: Process your transactions and send you related information, including confirmations and invoices.
legal.p2_l3: Communicate with you about products, services, offers, and promotions.
legal.p3_text: We may share your information with third-party vendors and service providers who need access to such information to carry out work on our behalf.
legal.p4_text: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access.
legal.p5_text: We may change this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of the policy.
legal.contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
legal.t1_text: By accessing or using our site, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
legal.t2_text: When you create an account with us, you must provide us with information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times.
legal.t3_text: We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order at any time for certain reasons including but not limited to: product availability, errors in the description or prices for the product, error in your order.
legal.t4_text: The Service and its original content, features and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Tlemcen Smart Supermarket and its licensors.
legal.t5_text: We may terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
